credit_line: Gift of the Estate of James Hazen Hyde
title: Portrait of a Singer, probably Faustina Bordoni
provenance:
Estate of James Hazen Hyde
Ex-collection: Laurence Currie, Coombe Warren, Kingston Hill, Surrey (Sold London, Christie's, December 17th, 1926 [Lot 134] for 168BP, the lot of four pastels [1960-1-7-a,b,c,d].
medium: Pastel on paper, mounted on canvas
description: Bust length portrait of a woman in the act of singing. She holds a music book in her right hand. She wears pendant pearl earrings as well as jewels and flowers in her hair. Her head is inclined slightly to the left and her face is turned half-right.
name: Drawing
